values: Steve Witkoff’s Critical Role in Negotiating Global Peace, and the Warmongers Trying to Stop Him

Steve Witkoff has no background in diplomacy but has turned out to be the most effective American diplomat in a generation. Here’s how he’s trying to resolve the conflicts in Gaza and Ukraine.

(00:00) What Witkoff Has Learned as Trump’s Global Negotiator

(12:50) Will We Achieve Peace Between Israel and Hamas?
(23:09) Why Corporate Media Hates Witkoff
(33:55) Israel’s Goals
(42:47) Trump’s Plan for Gaza
